meanings.definition: Agreed by a covenant or agreement.
meanings.sent1: The two friends made a covenanted promise to always help each other.
meanings.sent2: The neighbors had a covenanted agreement to share their garden produce.
meanings.sent3: The covenanted cats decided to team up and catch the mischievous mouse.
meanings.sent4: The covenanted stars in the sky seemed to twinkle in unison.
meanings.sent5: The covenanted oak trees stood tall and strong in the forest.

meanings.definition: Bound by a covenant or agreement.
meanings.sent1: The covenanted allies stood together in times of trouble.
meanings.sent2: The siblings were covenanted to always support each other no matter what.
meanings.sent3: The covenanted shoes refused to walk on any path except the one they agreed upon.
meanings.sent4: The covenanted rivers flowed side by side, never straying from their course.
meanings.sent5: The covenanted clouds seemed to move in perfect harmony across the sky.
